subject: Philosophy
title: The Sublime
description: A quick win: understand The Sublime.

hook.text: Standing at a cliff's edge, you feel awe and terror at once. That's the sublime.

buildup.text: Edmund Burke defined the sublime as the experience of vastness or power beyond our control.

discovery.text: Kant refined it. The sublime overwhelms our senses but elevates our reason above nature's chaos.

twist.text: A garden pleases you. A violent storm humbles you. Beauty comforts; the sublime transforms.

climax.text: Romantic painters chased the sublime â€” tiny humans dwarfed by mountains and endless seas.

punchline.text: The sublime is beauty that frightens you first.
